thread.title: Ex-Hearts of Oak striker Awudu Adama- appointing Tom Strand is a step in the right direction
thread.title_full: Ex-Hearts of Oak striker Awudu Adama- appointing Tom Strand is a step in the right direction

title: Ex-Hearts of Oak striker Awudu Adama- appointing Tom Strand is a step in the right direction
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 10:40 CET Ex-Hearts of Oak striker Awudu Adama- appointing Tom Strand is a step in the right direction - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Former Hearts of Oak goal machine Awudu Adama has welcomed news that his former side are on the verge of signing top Swedish coach Tom Strand. 
Adama, who has expressed massive disappointment in the current state of the club, says appointing Tom Strand will go a long way in improving their stature. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
